liveData: Live data from your farm sensors.
connectionIssue: Connection issue. Showing last data from {time}
adviceWaiting: Waiting for sensor data to generate advice...
adviceHighHumidity: High humidity increases fungal risk. Ensure good air circulation and monitor leaves for signs of mildew.
adviceLowMoisture: Soil moisture is low. It's a good time to consider irrigation.
adviceHighTemp: High temperatures can stress plants. Ensure they are well-watered to prevent wilting.
adviceLowNitro: Nitrogen levels are low. Consider applying a nitrogen-rich fertilizer or compost.
adviceLowPotassium: Potassium levels are low, which can affect fruit development. A potash supplement might be beneficial.
adviceOptimal: Current conditions look optimal. Continue monitoring your crops and use the AI Assistant to check any suspicious spots on leaves.
askAboutCropDiseases: Ask about crop diseases, analyze sensor data, or get advice.
bestCropSuggestion: What is the best crop to grow here?
speechNotSupported: Speech recognition is not supported by your browser.
speechPermissionError: Microphone permission was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
speechStartError: Could not start listening. Please check your microphone.
ttsError: Could not play audio due to an error: {error}
genericError: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
errorBotMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
sensorConfigDesc: Enter the 'Web app' URL from your deployed Google Apps Script to connect your live farm sensors.
languageSettingsDesc: Choose your preferred language for the application.
setFarmLocationDesc: Use your device's GPS or locate your farm on a map to pinpoint its exact location.
manualEntryDesc: Open Google Maps, find your farm, and right-click (or long-press on mobile) to see the coordinates. Copy and paste them below.
weatherError: Could not fetch weather data. Please try again later.
setFarmLocationPrompt: Set your farm's location in your profile to see the local weather forecast.
buyAgriInputsDesc: Shop for fertilizers, seeds, and pesticides.
sellCropResidueDesc: Earn extra income, don't burn stubble.
pricesDisclaimer: Prices are for demonstration. Last updated: {time}
stubbleSloganDesc: Don't let crop residue pollute our air. Sell it here and earn extra income while protecting the environment.
govSeedSchemesDesc: Purchase high-quality seeds available under government subsidy programs.
